description:
Riding in the rain shouldn’t mean your brakes yell at you. SRAM’s organic brake pad compound performs well in all conditions and is less likely to howl at you in the rain.

  • Rugged steel backplate performs well under heavy braking
  • Designed for Elixir, DB, Level brake systems
  • Pad shape Avid Elixir/SRAM Level/Force AXS HRD
name: SRAM Elixir/Level/Force Organic Quiet Disk Brake Pads
